item.content:encoded:
Price: $25.29 - $22.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:18:19 UTC – Details)

Product Description

18 UNITS DOG TOYS FOR PUPPIES AND SMALL DOGS.

Bestdoggo Super Value Toys Pack for Dogs, Help Your Dog Get More Fun, and Protect Your Home.

Dog loves to chew thing, especially puppy, they love to chew around when they feel lonely or teeth growing, give your dog our dog toy, let them play with the toy, not your shoes, clothes, underwear, or furniture.

Dogs love our toy, it’s a great gift for your beloved dogs.

Why do you need our toys?

Building relationship

You can play fetch or hiding game with your dog, it’s a great way to build relationship with your dog, makes your dog loves you more!

Teeth cleaning

No-toxic material rubber toy is a good toy for puppies and small dogs to chew.

Durable and fun to play with

18 pcs durable dog toys, it’s multifarious and colorful, your dog will love our toys.

Easy to wash

Our toys are washable.

18 pcs in one bag, one time purchase with long last.

Quantity
18 Units 7 Units 6 Units 1 Units

Package Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 10.79 x 9.53 x 3.94 inches; 1.43 Pounds
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ April 3, 2022
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ Bestdoggo
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B09V26ML4B

【Safe and High Quality】Great interactive and training toy, you can play fetch and hiding game with your dog, enhance the relationship between you and your dogs.Build energy and health, helps dog solve boredom and anxiety separation, protect furniture from dog chewing.
【Great for Dental Health】Clean teeth, clean your dog’s teeth, make your dog healthier, by chewing the rubber toys and rope toys, dog could get gum massage and stress relief.
【Design for Small Dogs and Puppies】Premium material with built-in squeaker, no glue and non-toxic material, safe and fun, great for puppies.【NOTE!】NOT for aggressive chew dogs, our toys designed for puppies small and medium-sized dog.
【Service from Us】We are so certain that your dog will love these small dog toys. If you have any questions about products, please feel free to contact us, we will always be ready to serve you.
【NOTE!】Please note! These toys set is not suitable for large dogs, aggressive dogs. The toys cannot be eaten. No toy is indestructible. Do not leave toys with unsupervised pets. Remove and replace toy if damaged. At the same time, we suggest that the owner pay attention to the damage of the puppy toy in time.

function isValidUrl(url) {
if (!url) {
return false;
}
var encodedUrl = encodeURI(url);
return encodedUrl.match(
/^(https?:\/\/)?(([a-z0-9-]|%[A-F0-9]{2})+\.)+(([a-z]|%[A-F0-9]{2})([a-z0-9]|%[A-F0-9]{2})*)(:[0-9]+)?(\/[a-z0-9;:,~!+#@&=%\/$\.?_-]+)?$/
);
}

function isNumericPrice(price) {
if (!price) {
return false;
}
return price.match(/^([0-9]+\.?[0-9]*)$|^([0-9]*\.[0-9]+)$/);
}

function isEmptyValue(input) {
return !input || input.length === 0 || input.match(/^\s*$/);
}

function truncate(input, length) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.substr(0, length);
}
}

function formatDate(year, date, month) {
return year + ‘-‘ + month + ‘-‘ + date;
}

function trim(input) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.trim();
}
}

function resetModalToInitialState(currentMonth, currentDate, currentYear) {
var enableOnlineStoreRadio = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_onlineRadio’);
var enableOfflineStoreRadio = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_offlineRadio’);
var onlineStoreInputForm = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_onlineInput’);

var offlineState = document.querySelector(‘#offlineState’);
var offlinePriceRaw = document.querySelector(‘#offlinePriceRaw’);
var offlineDay = document.querySelector(‘#offlineDay’);
var offlineMonth = document.querySelector(‘#offlineMonth’);
var offlineYear = document.querySelector(‘#offlineYear’);
var offlineCalendar = document.querySelector(‘#offlineCalendar’);

var thankYouDiv = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_thank’);
var errorDiv = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_error’);
var submitButton = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_submit’);
var loadingGifDiv = document.querySelector(‘#loading’);

var stateDefaultOption = document.querySelector(‘#stateDefaultOption’);
var stateDefaultPrompt = document.querySelector(‘#stateDefaultPrompt’);

if (thankYouDiv) {
thankYouDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (errorDiv) {
errorDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (loadingGifDiv) {
loadingGifDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (submitButton) {
submitButton.style.display = ‘block’;
}
onlineUrl.value = ”;
onlinePriceRaw.value = ”;
onlineShippingRaw.value = ”;
offlineStoreName.value = ”;
offlineCity.value = ”;
offlineState.value = ”;
offlinePriceRaw.value = ”;

stateDefaultOption.innerHTML = $(“#selectProvince”).val();
stateDefaultPrompt.innerHTML = $(“#selectProvince”).val();

setInitialStates(
onlineMonth,
currentMonth,
offlineMonth,
onlineDay,
currentDate,
offlineDay,
onlineYear,
currentYear,
offlineYear,
onlineStoreInputForm,

);

(as of Nov 30,2022 05:22:31 UTC – Details)

From the brand

At ImpiriLux, we are inspired by the joyous moments in all our lives, and our product selections are a reflection of that.

As a family business, we take pride in our beautiful products, excellent quality and customer dedication. Our original products are designed right here at home in the US and made by vetted world partners to ensure safety and quality for your family.

We aim to make your celebrations easier and more fun for everyone.

Beautiful Play Tents

Fun Tossing Games

Bop Bags for Active Play

Elegant Servingware

Impress Your Guests

ONE INFLATABLE TARGET WITH TWO SIDES – Whether it’s football season, baseball season or any season it is a great time for children to play and be active. Use it outdoors, indoors, at birthday parties, picnics or any gathering to add a fun activity.
MINI FOOTBALL AND BASEBALL – Soft foam filled mini football and baseball are included for fun right out of the box. The size of the balls have been specifically designed for kid’s small hands. A net is already attached to catch the balls.
QUICK SETUP – First fill the water-tight bottom chamber of the target with water or sand to keep it upright. Then fill the top with air. The great part is the special two stage air valve that makes inflation and deflation easy and fast.
SUPERIOR QUALITY – The target is constructed with phthalate free PVC. The plastic and printing conform to US toys safety standards. Each target is checked for defects by an 8 hour quality assurance inflation test.
SATISFACTION GUARANTEED – Providing quality products and customer satisfaction is our priority. Love the target or return it for a refund.


Presenting the Ultimate 5 Foot Tall 2-in-1 Inflatable Football and Baseball Target Set


  • Kids and parents love the Imagenius Toys Inflatable Football and Baseball Target Set as a fun, healthy, interactive way to play and be physically active.
  • Boys and girls enjoy this target set inside the house, back yard, birthdays, carnivals, field day and just about any other day.
  • Adults find this set perfect for football and baseball parties, tailgating, picnics, and gift giving.
  • High quality materials and workmanship utilized to make a product that lasts.


Benefits

  • Play solo or with family and friends
  • Practice pitching and throwing
  • Play indoors or outdoors
  • Use year round for football and baseball seasons
  • Makes for an awesome gift

Features

  • Two-sided target (football and baseball)
  • 5 Feet tall when inflated
  • Includes mini football and baseball
  • Made of high quality heavy duty PVC fabric
  • Precision manufacturing and inflation testing to ensure durability
  • Beautifully illustrated design

Read more

Height 60 inches 60 inches 60 inches 48 inches 48 inches
Accessories 1 Mini Football and 1 Mini Baseball 3 Mini Footballs 2 Foam Swords 1 Plush Nun-Chuck

item.title: Best Pet Supplies Crinkle Dog Toy for Small, Medium, and Large Breeds, Cute No Stuffing Duck with Soft Squeaker, Fun for Indoor Puppies and Senior Pups, Plush No Mess Chew and Play
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) Give Your Dog an Active Play Outlet with a Soft Crinkle Paper Dog Toy from Best Pet Supplies We all want to give our dogs a healthy way to play, have fun, and enjoy staying active; especially when it comes to giving them toys that are less messy and stand ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $5.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:20:14 UTC – Details)


Give Your Dog an Active Play Outlet with a Soft Crinkle Paper Dog Toy from Best Pet Supplies We all want to give our dogs a healthy way to play, have fun, and enjoy staying active; especially when it comes to giving them toys that are less messy and stand up to all the biting, chewing, and tugging. That’s why we created these super cute, high-quality Best Pet Supplies Duck-Shaped Dog Toys with built-in squeaker and crinkle paper. These versatile toys for dogs give them multiple ways to play and stay engaged while satisfying their natural behavioral needs. And because there’s no stuffing you don’t have to worry about cleaning up a big mess the moment your dog rips into them. Product Details: Soft Duck Dog Toy Built-In Squeezable Squeaker Crinkle Paper Interior No Stuffing or Fluff Available in 6 Fun Colors Overall Length: 15”
Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 15.5 x 7.5 x 1.5 inches; 0.63 Ounces
Item model number ‏ : ‎ PT332
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ July 27, 2021
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ Best Pet Supplies, LLC
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B09BBM5CX8
Country of Origin ‏ : ‎ China

Cute and Colorful Duck Shape – Shaped like a real duck these dog crinkle toys for small dogs, medium dogs, and every size in between comes in 6 unique colors and provides a more puppy friendly shape that’s easy to carry around
No Fluff, No Mess Design – Unlike messy bones, ropes, or other toys for aggressive chewers these dog crinkle toys won’t leave behind a mess after they’re done playing. They also boast reinforced fabric and stitching to help them hold up to chewing
Active Play, Tossing, and Retrieving – Our cute duck chew toys for dogs can be used for bonding with your puppy, reducing stress or separation anxiety, or simply giving them an active outlet for channeling aggression or intense play


Read more





Cleaning Made Easy

Need to get that toy cleaned from drools or dirt? Just toss it into the washing machine on gentle cycle and tumble dry on low heat.

Soft, Plush, and Durable

We use higher-quality materials in our dog toys to ensure they hold up to regular chewing, biting, tugging, and pulling. If the squeaker or the paper comes out simply discard them and you can continue to let your dog play with the duck for as long as it’s still chewable.

Audible Play Sounds

The crinkle paper in the body and the squeaker in the head give dogs multiple outlets for stimulating their auditory and physical senses. These distinct sounds will keep them having fun far longer than standard toys, so they can relieve stress, stay focused, and even reduce aggressive behaviors.

Adorable Variety

At 15” in size these colorful ducks are more fun for young puppies and older dogs alike because they feature multiple “chew points” and they’re a better shape for carrying.

Read more



4.5
Price: $5.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:20:14 UTC – Details)

item.content:encoded:
Price: $22.98 - $20.98
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:25:13 UTC – Details)

Product Description

UPDATE MATERIAL: 100% natural rubber and is non-toxic, durable enough for dog chewing.

Great for interactive indoor and outdoor play.

WANT TO EXTEND THE PLAYTIME?

Be sure to entice with a dash of peanut butter or similar paste-like food in the grooves, dogs will never stop obsessed with it.

HIGH DENSITY RING DOG TOY

with sufficient toughness was born to chew

Built for long-lasting engagement and promotes your dog’s strong jaws. discouraging destructive chewing, combat boredom and relieve anxiety or frustration. Soft and bouncy material keeps it never hurt puppy’s mouth or teeth when chewing.

Help your dog spend his boundless reserves of energy with the ring dog chew toy. This long-lasting chew toy will provide hours of playtime for you and your furry friend.

WHY DOGS NEED IT?

THICK RIM STANDS UP TO TOUGH CHEWING LAYERED TEXTURES BUILT FOR LONG-LASTING ENGAGEMENT AND ENTERTAINED FOR HOURS NUBS DESIGN TO REDUCE PLAQUE AND TARTAR HELP SATISFY DOG’S INSTINCTUAL NEEDS AND PROVIDES MENTAL STIMULATION.

All-STAR OF DOG TOYS VALUE SET OF 14!

Puppies explore the world by chewing, various types available for 2-3 toys timely change, that’s help puppies to stay curious, develop intelligence. JUST BUY ONE, get the combination of dog teething toys, chew toys, rope toys and interactive toys, every part of our dog toy pack is necessary, cooperate to keep dog happy chewing. The most valuable team works better for the dog’s healthy growth.

JUST CLICK IT, you can get all you need here.

Chewing is a great way for dogs to communicate, encourage it without being destructive helps to keep dog’s right chewing behavior from an early age. Rubber ring toy has a long-lasting, high bouncy, by chewing it, satisfy dogs’ instincts and relief the stress caused by boredom or anxiety. Want to extend playtime? Be sure to entice with a dash of peanut butter in the grooves.

4 adorable chew toys are specially designed for teething puppies and small dogs, including one heart-shaped toy, one star-shaped toy, one key-like toy and one biscuit-like toy, Teething puppies have strong chewing desire out of the pain from gum soreness, inflammation and teeth shooting. Chewing our soft and flexible rubber toys will help massage gums and relieve stress, which is good for teething in return.

Cotton rope dog toys are classical type, great for tug of war games. Your doggie will have a fun time while keeping your home tidy and clean. Also act as teeth floss, deeply clean the hidden germs.

High bouncy dog ball toy is great dog training toys, benefit your furry friends. They running, jumping to get the toys, that training dogs’ reaction and leaping ability, positively enhance the relationship between you and your dogs.

2 plush dog squeaky toys feature a inner squeaker, not too loud but still get the dog’s attention.

we recommend supervised play, timely replacement of the broken ones.

Please kindly give us an opportunity to fix if it didn’t meet your expectation, we will provide the best solution for you.

Package Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 14.21 x 9.8 x 3.94 inches; 1.96 Pounds
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ February 29, 2020
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ legend sandy
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B0859QZD6F

VARIETY CHEW TOYS FOR PUPPIES TEETHING: Natural rubber toys, specially designed for teething puppies and small dogs, meet all requirements. Thick ring dog toy was born to chew, available for long-lasting engagement, vent energy out and ease stress. 4 different shape rubber toys with hand-knotted rope are soft enough and bouncy, chewing to relieve sore & itchy teething issues. Bumps and grooves on them help to gum massage, fresh breath, scrape from the plaque, tartar to hidden germs.
SELF & INTERACTIVE PLAYING DOG TOYS FOR BOREDOM: Dogs will never stop getting fun from the squeaky toys. Frog and giraffe Plush dog toys are designed for self-playing. Inner squeaker makes a cute sound, attracts your pup, a great way to kill the boring time. Spiky ball for interactive games like chasing, fetching, etc. It helps to enhance the relationship between you and your furry friends. A perfect solution for fitness, exercise, and training.
DOG PULLING TOYS FOR INDOOR & OUTDOOR: Dog rope toys with plenty of uses, comes in 5 different varieties that offer to fetch and tug-of-war games, ideal gift for your pup. Whether at home or outdoors, rope toys with handles are perfect for dog to play with you or their friends. Using them as a puppy tooth floss cleaning toys, keep dental hygiene. All adopted natural cotton fibers, tightly hand-knotted, safe and washable.
SAFE & FUN FOR YOUR BEST FRIEND: Get 14 in one buy. A perfect combination of all kinds of dog toys, stimulate a dog’s mental and physical, cooperate to keep your puppy grow up happy and healthy. 100% non-toxic, BPA free, chewing and playing without smell. Not for aggressive chewers. Welcome to contact us before or after your purchase with any questions. If you are unsatisfied, we guarantee a full refund or replacement for no reason.

LONG PLUSH DOG TOYS WITH SQUEAKERS: ^o^ Each toy is super long, made of high quality plush, incredibly soft and skin-friendly. Feature two internal squeakers which protected by a fabric to prevent it from ripping out, creates hours and hours fun for your dogs, interactive dog toys for boredom.
DOG TOY NO STUFFING DURABLE: ^o^ Thicker fabric and better stitching make these unstuffies dog toys more durable for dogs to chew and play. item.content:encoded:
Price: $24.99 - $17.99
(as of Nov 29,2022 10:21:18 UTC – Details)

From the brand

How did we get our start?

We were born at the end of 2019, at a time when human social activities are limited, lonely, separated, and full of uncertainty about the future. We realize that care and love are the foundation of maintaining family and society. We create gifts for dogs, strengthen With the existing connection between the dog and the owner. We create new ways to play, add fun and color to life, and enrich the human experience of love and joy.

Why we love what we do?

We help people find and experience love and joy via playing with the dogs.

About us:

We make interesting and surprising toys for the people who want to create space for joy and love.

BEST SELLERS

NEW RELEASE

Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 8.07 x 7.68 x 3.62 inches; 14.11 Ounces
Item model number ‏ : ‎ FGWJ-04
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ April 25, 2019
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ 123456
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B07R3KQMMX

REDUCE DOG’S ANXIETY-These squeaky toys help dogs expend spare energy and release anxiety. Reduce destruction behaviors at home and train dogs cleverer.
IMPROVE TEETH HEALTY-Cleans teeth and massages gums. Washable cotton fibers help to fight against tartar buildup and preventing gum diseases. Satisfy dog’s chew and help to grow a natural protective layer.
SOFT PLUSH-Made from plush and cotton fabric, these plush toys are perfectly safe and reliable for your pets to chew and play.

Read more

Squeaky Toys Benefits

Playing squeaky toys is a very healthy behavior for dogs because it triggers their reward center and causes pleasant feelings in their brain

  • Less likely to bite furniture
  • get dog’s attention and reward good behavior
  • get dogs excited
  • motivate dogs

Bright and Crisp Sound Effect

Squeaky Sound Performance Test

The sound of toys have been carefully tested by Studio Mic, which is loud, alluring and pleasantly stimulating. So your pups will go to great lengths to dominate the source of the squeak and be encouraged to keep squeezing

  • A total of 12 toys with squeakers, 12 original designs in different shapes and sizes
  • Apple, Pumpkin, Whole Watermelon, Pink Star, A Slice of Melon, Roast, Lobster, Carrot, Orange, Banana, Slipper, Ice Cream
  • Suitable for small and medium-sized dogs to play, chase and bites
  • Fascinated Squeaky Sensations
  • Durable Squeakers and Long-Lasting Performance

Read more

Read more

Stitching Skill

The toys are firm and durable with dense knitting stitches. Your dog can feel free to chew for a long time

Soft Plush Surface

Made of premium quality natural cotton, the soft and flexible surface is super comfortable to play and chew

Non-smell Design

Even through dog’s sense of smell is around 10,000 – 100,000 times better than ours, no smell can be detected from the toys thanks to the safe and intoxic design. Without smell, without worry

Read more





Dog Chew Toy for Aggressive Chewers
6 PCS Halloween Dog Squeaky Toys for Aggressive chewers

5 Pcs Dog Squeaky Toys for Aggressive Chewers

Quantity of Toys 1 6 1 5 5 6
Crinkle Paper
✓
✓
